scripts.setup: npm i && npm install --prefix app/client && npm install --prefix app/server && npm run dev
scripts.livesetup: npm i && npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client
scripts._dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix app/server"  "npm run dev --prefix app/client"
